name: MDLSkyCubeTexture
desc: A generator of texel data that creates cube textures using a physically realistic simulation of the sunlit sky.

items.name: init(name: String?, channelEncoding: MDLTextureChannelEncoding, textureDimensions: vector_int2, turbidity: Float, sunElevation: Float, upperAtmosphereScattering: Float, groundAlbedo: Float)
items.desc: Initializes a sky cube texture object with the specified parameters.

items.name: var turbidity: Float
items.desc: The cloudiness or haziness of the simulated sky.

items.name: var sunElevation: Float
items.desc: The sunâ€™s position in the simulated sky.

items.name: var upperAtmosphereScattering: Float
items.desc: A factor that influences the color of the simulated sky.

items.name: var groundAlbedo: Float
items.desc: A factor that influences the clarity of the simulated sky.

items.name: var groundColor: CGColor?
items.desc: The color of the simulated ground.

items.name: var horizonElevation: Float
items.desc: The angle, in radians relative to center, below which to render the ground color.

items.name: var gamma: Float
items.desc: The amount of gamma correction to apply during tone mapping.

items.name: var exposure: Float
items.desc: The amount of exposure compensation to apply during tone mapping.

items.name: var brightness: Float
items.desc: The amount of brightness enhancement to apply during tone mapping.

items.name: var contrast: Float
items.desc: The amount of contrast enhancement to apply during tone mapping.

items.name: var saturation: Float
items.desc: The amount of saturation enhancement to apply during tone mapping.

items.name: var highDynamicRangeCompression: vector_float2
items.desc: Two parameters that determine the brightness compression curve for colors in the texture image.

items.name: func update()
items.desc: Generates new texel data matching the current sky parameters.

items.name: init(name: String?, channelEncoding: MDLTextureChannelEncoding, textureDimensions: vector_int2, turbidity: Float, sunElevation: Float, sunAzimuth: Float, upperAtmosphereScattering: Float, groundAlbedo: Float)
